resources.string: Victoria Freeman, the sog, M2K, Marius586, halal-beef & KuatoDev ©️2025
An unexpected error occurred.\nSorry for the inconvenience.
Back up boot image to Android and/or Windows
Toggle mounting Windows partition in order to view or edit content inside
Tools and scripts for a more enjoyable Windows experience
Dump modem to Windows to fix LTE on SIM1 in Windows.\nRequired before every Windows boot
Please download the UEFI image for %s and place it in the UEFI FOLDER in INTERNAL STORAGE (/sdcard/UEFI)
Dump modem, flash UEFI, and reboot to Windows in one click
Flash UEFI and reboot to Windows in one click
Adds the Switch to Android app to Windows
Adds a script to C:⧹Toolbox which allows you to toggle USB Host Mode
Adds browser shortcuts containing ARM software to C:⧹Toolbox
Adds a script to C:⧹Toolbox that lets you rotate the screen with a shortcut\n(useful for devices without working sensors)
Adds a script to Windows which automatically flashes the Android boot.img whenever Windows boots
Copies the AtlasOS or ReviOS playbook and AME Wizard to C:⧹Toolbox
Adds a script to C:⧹Toolbox which allows you to remove Microsoft Edge \/ Windows Defender
Adds an assortment of scripts and tweaks to C:⧹Toolbox
Adds installers for several frameworks into C:⧹Toolbox
Patches the kernel for seamless dualbooting
Adds a script to C:⧹Toolbox which allows you to toggle tablet mode
Flashes OOS11 devcfg so that Windows can boot on OOS12 devices
Back up current Android boot image?
Dump modem1st and modem2st to Windows partition?
Flash UEFI? \nIf so, the next boot will be in Windows
Create Switch to Android app in C:\\sta?
Copy USB Host Mode script to C:⧹Toolbox?
Install boot.img autoflasher script into Windows?
Download and move AtlasOS or ReviOS playbook to C:⧹Toolbox?
Copy Edge \/ Defender remover scripts to C:⧹Toolbox?
Download and move C++ Redistributables, DirectX, OpenGL, OpenAL, PhysX, and XNA framework installers to C:⧹Toolbox?\n(this may take some time)
Patch and flash your current kernel?\n!!!DO NOT PRESS YES UNLESS YOUR DEVICE IS %s!!!
Copy tablet mode script to C:⧹Toolbox?
Flash OOS11 devcfg?\n!!!DO NOT PRESS YES UNLESS YOUR DEVICE IS %s!!!
Something went wrong, \nWindows could not be mounted.\nRequest help in the Telegram chat.
NTFS support not detected. \nInstall NTFS3G module?
No internet connection found.\nConnect to the internet and try again.
Boot image has been patched and flashed.\nPatched image can also be found at /sdcard/patched-boot.img.\nUse your %s to switch between Windows and Android.
OOS11 devcfg has been flashed.\nOriginal devcfg can be found at /sdcard/devcfg.img.\nUse sdd.exe in STA Creator to flash OOS12 devcfg when returning to Android
UEFI flashed successfully.\nNext boot will boot into Windows.
!!WARNING!!\n UFS may be worn down by this, enable only if you receive a lot of OTA updates
!!WARNING!!\nDevice unsupported\nUse this app at your own risk
OK, just let me use the app
Your panel has not been confirmed to work, please share your Windows experience in the Telegram chat
Back up boot.img if none is detected (Windows)
Back up boot.img if none is detected (Android)
Require confirmation for QS quickboot tile
Automatically mount Windows on device start
Check for required files when flashing devcfg
su -c dd bs=8M if=/dev/block/by-name/modemst1 of=$(find /mnt/sdcard/Windows/Windows/System32/DriverStore/FileRepository -name qcremotefs8150.inf_arm64_*)/bootmodem_fs1 bs=8388608
su -c dd bs=8M if=/dev/block/by-name/modemst2 of=$(find /mnt/sdcard/Windows/Windows/System32/DriverStore/FileRepository -name qcremotefs8150.inf_arm64_*)/bootmodem_fs2 bs=8388608
su -c dd bs=8M if=/dev/block/by-name/modemst1 of=$(find /mnt/Windows/Windows/System32/DriverStore/FileRepository -name qcremotefs8150.inf_arm64_*)/bootmodem_fs1 bs=8388608
su -c dd bs=8M if=/dev/block/by-name/modemst2 of=$(find /mnt/Windows/Windows/System32/DriverStore/FileRepository -name qcremotefs8150.inf_arm64_*)/bootmodem_fs2 bs=8388608
